content: fish cloth comes out to 6 x 9 inches for me us #4 #6 for normal people dishcloth cotton worsted weight why it s awesome only 18 purl stitches in total only 4 ends to weave in if you do it in 2 colors gauge doesn t matter cute and colorful use up those cotton skeins everyone keeps giving to you rs = right side ws = wrong side sts = stitches k = knit p = purl kfb = knit into the front and the back of the same stitch k2tog = knit two stitches together mc = main color cc = contrast color color of your stripes head all in mc row # directions stitch count ws 1 with mc cast on 1 1 rs 2 kfb or the increase of your choice/preference 2 3 kfb kfb 4 4 kfb k2 kfb 6 5 kfb k4 kfb 8 6 kfb k6 kfb 10 7 kfb k8 kfb 12 8 kfb k10 kfb 14 9 kfb k12 kfb 16 10 kfb k14 kfb 18 11 k all sts 18 12 kfb k16 kfb 20 13 k all sts 20 14 kfb k18 kfb 22 15 k all sts 22 16 kfb k20 kfb 24 17 k all sts 24 rs 18 kfb k22 kfb 26 ws 19 k all sts 26 body 2 row stripes of alternating mc and cc carrying colors up the side row # directions stitch count rs 1 in cc knit all sts 26 ws 2 repeat row #1 26 rs 3 in mc knit all sts 26 ws 4 repeat row #3 26 5-28 repeat row 1-4 six more times ending with mc stripe 26 rs 29 in cc knit all sts 26 ws 30 in cc k2tog k22 k2tog or decrease of your choice 24 31 in mc knit all sts 24 32 in mc k2tog k20 k2tog 22 33 in cc knit all sts 22 34 in cc k2tog k18 k2tog 20 35 in mc knit all sts 20 36 in mc k2tog k16 k2tog 18 rs 37 in cc knit all sts 18 ws 38 in cc k2tog k14 k2tog cut cc leave tail to weave in at end 16 tail all in mc row # directions stitch count rs 1 with mc k all sts 16 ws 2 k2tog k12 k2tog 14 rs 3 k all sts 14 ws 4 k2tog k10 k2tog 12 5-7 k1 p1 six times 12 ws 8 kfb k10 kfb 14 9 kfb k12 kfb 16 10 kfb k14 kfb 18 11 kfb k16 kfb 20 12 kfb k18 kfb 22 13 kfb k20 kfb 24 ws 14 kfb k22 kfb 26 15-16 k all sts 26 rs 17 bind off all sts with bind off of your choice weave in ends and admire
